INSERT INTO tbl_board_inquiry ( member_id, business_id, board_inquiry_title , board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_status) VALUES( #{memberId}, null, #{boardInquiryTitle} , #{boardInquiryContent}, #{boardInquiryStatus});

INSERT INTO tbl_board_inquiry ( member_id, business_id, board_inquiry_title , board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_status) VALUES( null, #{businessId}, #{boardInquiryTitle} , #{boardInquiryContent}, #{boardInquiryStatus});
mapper.select: select q.board_inquiry_id, q.member_id, q.board_inquiry_title, q.board_inquiry_content, q.board_inquiry_register_date, q.board_inquiry_status , m.member_email, m.member_name, m.member_img_original_name, m.member_img_uuid, m.member_img_path , 'member' writer_type from tbl_board_inquiry q join tbl_member m on q.member_id = m.member_id where board_inquiry_id = #{boardInquiryId} and q.board_inquiry_status = 1

select q.board_inquiry_id, q.business_id, q.board_inquiry_title, q.board_inquiry_content, q.board_inquiry_register_date, q.board_inquiry_status , b.business_id, b.business_email, b.business_ceo_name, b.business_number , b.business_company_name, b.business_phone_number, b.business_img_original_name , b.business_img_uuid, b.business_img_path, b.business_location, b.business_category , 'business' writer_type from tbl_board_inquiry q join tbl_business b on q.business_id = b.business_id where board_inquiry_id = #{boardInquiryId} and q.board_inquiry_status = 1

select board_inquiry_id, member_id, business_id , board_inquiry_title, board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_register_date , board_inquiry_status from tbl_board_inquiry where board_inquiry_status = 1 order by board_inquiry_id desc

select board_inquiry_id, member_id, business_id , board_inquiry_title, board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_register_date , board_inquiry_status from tbl_board_inquiry where board_inquiry_status = 1 order by board_inquiry_id desc limit #{startRow}, #{amount}
select count(member_id) from tbl_board_inquiry where member_id = #{memberId}
select board_inquiry_id from tbl_board_inquiry_answer where board_inquiry_id = #{boardInquiryId}
select count(business_id) from tbl_board_inquiry where business_id = #{businessId}

select bi.board_inquiry_id, m.member_id, b.business_id, m.member_name, b.business_ceo_name, board_inquiry_title, board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_register_date, board_inquiry_answer_id from tbl_board_inquiry bi left join tbl_member m on bi.member_id = m.member_id left join tbl_business b on bi.business_id = b.business_id left join tbl_board_inquiry_answer ia on bi.board_inquiry_id = ia.board_inquiry_id order by bi.board_inquiry_id desc limit #{adminCriteria.offset}, #{adminCriteria.rowCount}

select bi.board_inquiry_id, bi.member_id, bi.business_id, m.member_name, b.business_ceo_name, board_inquiry_title, board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_register_date, board_inquiry_status, board_inquiry_answer_id,board_inquiry_answer_content, board_inquiry_answer_register_date from tbl_board_inquiry bi left join tbl_board_inquiry_answer bia on bi.board_inquiry_id = bia.board_inquiry_id left join tbl_member m on bi.member_id = m.member_id left join tbl_business b on bi.business_id = b.business_id where bi.board_inquiry_id = #{boardInquiryId}

select board_inquiry_id, member_id, business_id, board_inquiry_title, board_inquiry_content, board_inquiry_register_date, board_inquiry_status from tbl_board_inquiry where board_inquiry_status = 1 order by board_inquiry_id desc limit #{cri.startRow}, #{cri.amount}
